titleStmt.title: The pope in his fury doth answer returne, to a letter ye which to Rome is late come
titleStmt.author: Peele, Steven.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by Alexander Lacie for Henrie Kyrkham, dwelling at the signe of the blacke Boy, at the middle north dore of Paules church,

notesStmt.note: Verse - "I doe esteme your kyndnes much".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the blacke Boy, at the middle north dore of Paules church
